benefitsData.heading: Pepsico
benefitsData.text: Pepsi's appeal stems from a combination of its taste, branding, and the broader PepsiCo business model. It's a globally recognized brand with a history of innovation and adaptation to consumer preferences.

item.text: Pepsi's formula has evolved over time, but it's known for a distinct taste profile, often perceived as sweeter and more citrusy than Coca-Cola.
item.heading: Taste and Innovation:

item.text: Pepsi has a strong global presence and a history of impactful advertising campaigns, often targeting younger demographics and emphasizing themes of rebellion and individuality.
item.heading: Branding and Marketing:

item.text: Pepsi was invented in 1893 by Caleb Bradham and was initially marketed as "Brad's Drink" and later renamed Pepsi-Cola in 1898.
item.heading: Historical Context:

ctaData.heading: Pepsi use common tracking technologies
ctaData.subHeading: Stop by the Coca‑Cola Store at World of Coca‑Cola to personalize your very own Share a Coke can. Can’t visit in person? Personalize your own cans and bottles online, anytime.

data.question: When will the PEPSI® Challenge Taste Tour Merchandise Sweepstakes draw occur?
data.answer: One Hundred (100) potential winners will be randomly selected from all eligible entries received on or about May 10, 2025.

data.question: How many prizes are available?
data.answer: One Hundred (100) The PEPSI® Challenge Taste Tour Merchandise prizes are available to be awarded.

data.question: What are PEPSI® Drops?
data.answer: With a legacy spanning 125 years at the crossroads of music, fashion, sports, food, and culture, Pepsi is ready to transform Pepsi.com into a haven for exclusive access to the kind of culturally significant drops that only Pepsi can deliver.

headerData.title: Pesi
headerData.description: Pepsi is a carbonated soft drink with a cola flavor, manufactured by PepsiCo which serves as its flagship product.

sectionHeadingData.preHeading: We use colors for a variety of reasons that vary product to product.
sectionHeadingData.heading: Make our products more appealing or fun.
